pages.text: As a weary traveller makes their way through the dark, foreboding plane, they should keep their eyes open for a few important landmarks.
pages.title: Structures

pages.text: The platform houses the altar to spawn the $(thing)Shadowlord$(). $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Shadowlord_Platform)Read More$(/l)
pages.title: Shadowlord Platform

pages.text: Towering over all else in the $(thing)Abyss$(), the altar for $(thing)Elusive$() can be found here. $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Illusion_Tree)Read More$(/l)
pages.title: Illusion Tree

pages.text: The only known home of the $(thing)Jawe$() $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Jawe Hut)Read More$(/l)
pages.title: Jawe Hut

pages.text: $(thing)Flesh Temples$() are guarded by a horrific creature - the $(thing)Flesh Eater$(). $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Flesh_Temple)Read More$(/l)
pages.title: Flesh Temple

pages.text: From just an opening in the abyssal surface, these grottos house $(thing)Eye Bulbs$(). $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Abyssal_Eye_Grotto)Read More$(/l)
pages.title: Abyssal Eye Grotto
